title: Lucian is OP!
body: Alright... I'm sure everyone who played adc has come across a Lucian before, or even played as Lucian. I personally HATE him! He is impossible to beat. I played against him many times in a row and every single time he beat me. I tried many different strategies when going against him, and none worked. Riot should nerf Lucian as soon as possible. What are your thoughts on this?

replies.body: Graves is the new Lucian tho...
Play Cait and out poke or play Corki and out trade.
I have a solution, if you are up against a lucian again.... just don't play adc :)
Lucian has the worst range of any ADC. Just poke him from afar and you won't have to worry about getting any poke back.
Lucian op? wtf? If you are a better adc than the Lucian you will beat him, don't worry :) unless your supp decides it is time to feed and you don't do anything about it.
